timeline.message:
Make ZkBucketDataAccessor realm-aware

Because Helix Controller now uses WAGED rebalancer as the default rebalancer, it tries to create an instance of ZkBucketDataAccessor. This will fail unless ZkBucketDataAccessor was also made realm-aware. We can simply use a FederatedZkClient here since BucketDataAccessor does not support ephemeral operations.

timeline.bodyText: nit, just to confirm, I think we are migrating all the SystemPropertyKeys to someone station HelixProperty solution. Will this be also migrated to it once it's done?

replies.bodyText: This config should follow wherever all Helix system config properties go. I am not sure about what you mean by HelixProperty solution, but if there's an agreed-upon place we should group all configs in, then this should go with them.
